overview: The film tells the story of 32-year-old heroine Li Juan, who works in sales for a small company in Shanghai but has the dream that one day she will be able to make her own films. But over the course of the year, li juan experienced various setbacks, including losing her job, having her script rejected and a frustrated relationship. meanwhile, in her hometown, people of her age are settling down and get married. on new year’s eve, li juan was in conflict with her father over the idea of getting married or not, so she slammed the door and left the house...
title: Ke le Qiao
